title: Billion-Dollar Bank Pays $15,000,000 for Decade of ‘Deceptive Practices’ Against Its Customers
description:
A US-based bank is paying $15 million for allegedly engaging in deceptive practices against its customers for at least a decade. The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) says MUFG Union Bank, which has been acquired by U.S. Bancorp, told customers they would receive a series of fee waivers and discounts. But in […]

The post Billion-Dollar Bank Pays $15,000,000 for Decade of ‘Deceptive Practices’ Against Its Customers appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
